name: Our Last Time
description:
"Our Last Time" is an interactive 3D puzzle adventure which involves 4 atypical friends. Everyone has its problems and its secrets, now it's your turn to discover them.

It had never been so difficult to stay close to your group of friends as it's now.

Have you ever wondered what would happen if you had some superpower? Now imagine your group of friends have some kind of power too. Everything seems amazing: Flying, being invisible, control water... But what if it means that your memories fade away? Would you stay or would you go away from them if that means you keep with you all the good memories you lived with them?
Explore the rooms of this friends and find out their story, and the power they had, by traveling through time and interacting with the world they live in.

Welcome to Our Last Time.

Game creators:
-Anna Ponce - Main Programmer & Animator
-Josep Vilaplana - Producer & Programmer
-Enya Moreno - Lead artist, Lead designer, Lead writer, Translation, Concept artist, Level designer
-Raul Espinosa - Lead artist, Lighting Artist, Level Builder, VFX artist
-Alejandro Melero - Soundrack & Composer
-Ana de Lorenza - Sound Designer

DOWNLOAD LINK SOON

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/lionsealstudio
Note: This game is playable with keyboard + mouse and with a gamepad.
